item.title: ListToDict
item.description: 파이썬 List to Dict 1. Dictionary Comprehesion A = ['가', '나', '다'] dictionary = {string: i for i, num in enumerate(A)} print(dictionary) # {'가':0 , '나':1, '다':2} 2. dict.fromkeys(key, value) A = ['가', '나', '다'] dictionary = dict.fromkeys(A, 0) print(dictionary) # {'가':0 , '나':0, '다':0} 3. zip 사용하여 묶기 A = ['가', '나', '다'] B = [0, 1, 2] dictionary = dict(zip(A, B)) # {'가':0 , '나':1, '다':2}
